tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bone_structure_force_distribution (
  bone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bone_name VARCHAR(255),
  force_distribution FLOAT,
  injury_prevention_measurements TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE BoneStructure ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(100), study_date DATE, force_distribution JSONB );
CREATE TABLE InjuryPrevention ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, injury_type VARCHAR(100), prevention_method VARCHAR(255), injury_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE ForceMeasurement ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, bone_id UUID REFERENCES BoneStructure(id), force_value FLOAT, measurement_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE force_sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name STRING,
  sensor_type STRING,
  insertion_location STRING,
  accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE bone_structures (
  bone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bone_name STRING,
  bone_type STRING,
  bone_density FLOAT,
  mass FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE force_measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  bone_id INT,
  force_reading FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE injury_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bone_id INT,
  injury_type STRING,
  severity INT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ForceSensors (
  sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  sensor_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  sensor_accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE BoneStructures (
  structure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  structure_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  structure_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  structure_size VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ForceMeasurements (
  measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT REFERENCES ForceSensors(sensor_id),
  structure_id INT REFERENCES BoneStructures(structure_id),
  force_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  measurement_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchParticipants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  participant_age INT NOT NULL,
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE StudyResults (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT REFERENCES ResearchParticipants(participant_id),
  structure_id INT REFERENCES BoneStructures(structure_id),
  force_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  result_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
